trinket.name: equip_mirrorRing
trinket.description: A ring with a small mirror on it. Your opponent has got to have god awful aim to ever accidentally hit this.
trinket.effect: Gives a 5% chance to reflect any item used on you back to the user.

trinket.effect: Gives a 5% chance to reflect any item used on you back to the user.
